answerText: North and South[10] North and South was written by this woman who also wrote a biography of Charlotte Brontë. Her novels include Mary Barton and Cranford.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 5 | 12 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This novel is set in the industrial city of Milton, which is modeled after Manchester. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel whose protagonist, Margaret Hale, meets the Union leader Nicholas Higgins and eventually marries John Thornton, the owner of a cotton mill.
